title: saTeya samsra
sahitya:
saTeya samsAra sAgaravendu tiLiyade drDha buddhiyinda narayAke keDutiharayya


caraNam 1    honnu haNavuLLavara banni kuLLirendu mannisuvaradhika sambhramadindali 
unnat-aishvaryavillada baDava tA baralu kunni hOgenut aTTuvar mUDhatanadi
    caraNam 2    baDavanAdare tma baDavane mattOrva kadu bhAgyanAgi ballidanAdane 
biDade maNNinoLLidda cinnavadu keDuvude baDva ballidanemba nuDi AtmaguNTe
    caraNam 3    inidella mAya mOhakavemba sharadhiyoLu anudinavu muLugi kOTalegoLisuta 
cinumayAmbudhi purandara viTTalana nenedu ghana padavanaiduvaru bhajisirayya
